Privacy Statement
Lahey Computer Systems, Inc. created
this privacy statement to demonstrate our commitment to privacy. The following
discloses our information gathering and dissemination practices for these
websites: www.lahey.com and www.laheyforum.com.
Contact Information
Our product registration
form, forums, and surveys ask visitors for contact information (name, e-mail address,
etc.). We use the contact information to send visitors information about
our company and the products and services we offer. Contact information
is also used to contact customers when necessary.
Links
Our site contains links to other sites.
Lahey Computer Systems, Inc. is not responsible for the privacy practices
or the content of other websites.
Your Choice
If you don't want us to send you information
about our company and the products and services we offer or want to change
your address, please contact your local reseller or distributor. Thank you.
Contact | Privacy Policy
